field.name: theme_gallery_padding
field.label: Gallery Padding Sides Addition
field.description: Add some padding from the sides of the gallery. Note that initially the nested type has some padding because of it's algorthitm.

field.name: tiles_nested_optimal_tile_width
field.label: Optimal Tile Width
field.description: Choose the optimal tile width that you prefer. The tile sizes will be set accordingly

field.name: tiles_space_between_cols
field.label: Space Between Columns
field.description: Space between columns. Horizontal and vertical space

field.name: tiles_space_between_cols_mobile
field.label: Space Between Columns Mobile Size
field.description: Space between columns. Horizontal and vertical space on mobile gallery size (under 480px))

field.description: show gallery preloader, to show before first tile place

field.name: theme_preloading_height

field.description: The height of the preloading area

field.name: theme_preloader_vertpos
field.label: Preloader Circle Y Pos
field.description: The y position of the preloading circle

field.name: theme_auto_open
field.label: Open Lightbox At Tile
